amendment.description: Amendment requires companies convicted of crimes to notify as best as possible all the victims of those crimes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require offenders who are convicted of fraud and other white collar crime to give appropriate notice to victims and other persons in cases where there are multiple victims eligible to receive restitution.

action.text: Sanders amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. Modification adds language specifying that the offender is required to give appropriate notice to victims, when the identity of the victims can be reasonably ascertained.
On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
